verses.kjv: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD's message came to me:

verses.kjv: Now, thou son of man, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city? yea, thou shalt shew her all her abominations.
verses.ct: "Now, son of man, are you ready to pass judgment? Are you ready to pass judgment on this city of bloodshed? Then confront her with all her disgusting practices.

verses.kjv: Then say thou, Thus saith the Lord GOD, The city sheddeth blood in the midst of it, that her time may come, and maketh idols against herself to defile herself.
verses.ct: Say to her, 'This is what the Lord GOD says: You are a city that spills blood within your own walls, bringing your own doom closer, and you make idols to pollute yourself.

verses.kjv: Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen, and a mocking to all countries.
verses.ct: You have become guilty through the blood you have spilled, and you have made yourself unclean through the idols you have crafted. You have brought your final days near and reached the end of your years. That is why I have turned you into an object of disgrace among the nations and ridicule in every country.

verses.kjv: Those that be near, and those that be far from thee, shall mock thee, which art infamous and much vexed.
verses.ct: Those nearby and those far away will mock you, because your reputation is ruined and you are full of chaos.

verses.kjv: Behold, the princes of Israel, every one were in thee to their power to shed blood.
verses.ct: Look — every leader of Israel within you has used their power to shed blood.

verses.kjv: In thee have they set light by father and mother: in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger: in thee have they vexed the fatherless and the widow.
verses.ct: Within you, people have treated their fathers and mothers with contempt. Within you, they have exploited foreigners. Within you, they have mistreated orphans and widows.

verses.kjv: Thou hast despised mine holy things, and hast profaned my sabbaths.
verses.ct: You have shown contempt for my holy things and violated my Sabbaths.

verses.kjv: In thee are men that carry tales to shed blood: and in thee they eat upon the mountains: in the midst of thee they commit lewdness.
verses.ct: Within you are slanderers who cause bloodshed. Within you, people feast at pagan shrines on the mountains. Within you, they practice sexual immorality.

verses.kjv: In thee have they discovered their fathers’ nakedness: in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.
verses.ct: Within you, men have had relations with their fathers' wives. Within you, they have forced themselves on women during their menstrual period.

verses.kjv: And one hath committed abomination with his neighbour’s wife; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter in law; and another in thee hath humbled his sister, his father’s daughter.
verses.ct: One man commits a disgusting act with his neighbor's wife. Another defiles his daughter-in-law through sexual immorality. Still another within you forces himself on his own sister, his father's daughter.

verses.kjv: In thee have they taken gifts to shed blood; thou hast taken usury and increase, and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbours by extortion, and hast forgotten me, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: Within you, people accept bribes to shed blood. You charge excessive interest and make unjust profit, and you have exploited your neighbors through extortion. You have forgotten me, declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Behold, therefore I have smitten mine hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made, and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee.
verses.ct: "Look — I am clapping my hands in anger at your dishonest profits and at the bloodshed within you.

verses.kjv: Can thine heart endure, or can thine hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the LORD have spoken it, and will do it.
verses.ct: Will your courage hold up? Will your hands stay strong when I deal with you? I, the LORD, have spoken, and I will carry it out.

verses.kjv: And I will scatter thee among the heathen, and disperse thee in the countries, and will consume thy filthiness out of thee.
verses.ct: I will scatter you among the nations and disperse you across many countries, and I will purge your filthiness from you.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen, and thou shalt know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: You will be degraded in the sight of the nations because of your own actions, and you will know that I am the LORD."

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD's message came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, the house of Israel is to me become dross: all they are brass, and tin, and iron, and lead, in the midst of the furnace; they are even the dross of silver.
verses.ct: "Son of man, the people of Israel have become like waste metal to me. All of them are just bronze, tin, iron, and lead left over in a furnace — they are nothing but the impurities left after refining silver.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because ye are all become dross, behold, therefore I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem.
verses.ct: So this is what the Lord GOD says: Because all of you have become like waste metal, I am going to gather you together inside Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: As they gather silver, and brass, and iron, and lead, and tin, into the midst of the furnace, to blow the fire upon it, to melt it; so will I gather you in mine anger and in my fury, and I will leave you there, and melt you.
verses.ct: Just as silver, bronze, iron, lead, and tin are collected into a furnace and the fire is stoked to melt them down, I will gather you in my anger and my fury. I will put you there and melt you down.

verses.kjv: Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you in the fire of my wrath, and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof.
verses.ct: Yes, I will gather you and blast you with the fire of my rage, and you will be melted inside the city.

verses.kjv: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the LORD have poured out my fury upon you.
verses.ct: Just as silver melts inside a furnace, you will be melted inside it. Then you will know that I, the LORD, have poured out my fury on you."

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD's message came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, say unto her, Thou art the land that is not cleansed, nor rained upon in the day of indignation.
verses.ct: "Son of man, say to the land: You are a country that has not been cleansed, that has received no rain during the time of judgment.

verses.kjv: There is a conspiracy of her prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey; they have devoured souls; they have taken the treasure and precious things; they have made her many widows in the midst thereof.
verses.ct: Her prophets have formed a conspiracy within her. Like a roaring lion tearing apart its prey, they have devoured people. They have seized treasure and valuables. They have created many widows within her.

verses.kjv: Her priests have violated my law, and have profaned mine holy things: they have put no difference between the holy and profane, neither have they shewed difference between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths, and I am profaned among them.
verses.ct: Her priests have violated my law and treated my holy things with contempt. They have made no distinction between what is holy and what is common, and they have not taught the difference between what is unclean and what is clean. They have ignored my Sabbaths, and I am dishonored among them.

verses.kjv: Her princes in the midst thereof are like wolves ravening the prey, to shed blood, and to destroy souls, to get dishonest gain.
verses.ct: Her officials within her are like wolves tearing apart prey — shedding blood and destroying lives to grab dishonest profit.

verses.kjv: And her prophets have daubed them with untempered morter, seeing vanity, and divining lies unto them, saying, Thus saith the Lord GOD, when the LORD hath not spoken.
verses.ct: Her prophets have covered up their crimes with whitewash, claiming false visions and delivering lying predictions, saying, 'This is what the Lord GOD says,' when the LORD has not spoken at all.

verses.kjv: The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery, and have vexed the poor and needy: yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully.
verses.ct: The common people of the land have practiced oppression and committed robbery. They have mistreated the poor and needy, and they have unjustly exploited foreigners.

verses.kjv: And I sought for a man among them, that should make up the hedge, and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I should not destroy it: but I found none.
verses.ct: I searched for someone among them who would repair the wall and stand in the gap in my presence to defend the land, so that I would not have to destroy it — but I found no one.

verses.kjv: Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath: their own way have I recompensed upon their heads, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.ct: So I have poured out my fury on them. I have consumed them with the fire of my rage. I have brought the consequences of their own actions down on their heads, declares the Lord GOD."
